This class sets up the menubar on a component with the "print" menuitem

getActiveMenuItem

public static javax.swing.JMenuItem getActiveMenuItem(java.lang.String menu_text,
                                                      java.awt.Component comp)
This method will return a JMenuItem with the provided text name. The menu item will have a save listener added to it. If clicked on, this menu item will save as an image the component passed in.

Parameters:
menu_text - Display text on the JMenuItem
comp - Component to be saved.
Returns:
menu item with listener to initiate image saving routine.
